person.persName: Josiah B. Spurlock (Harlan County farmer, merchant, and soldier)

body.p: A Kentucky farmer, merchant, and solider. Lived in Harlan County, Kentucky in 1860. Married to Martha Spurlock. Father of George L. Spurlock, Mary L. Spurlock, Sarah Spurlock, Nancy Spurlock, Biron Spurlock, Janes Spurlock, and Curtis G. Spurlock. Served as a first lieutenant (Co. C) and captain (Co. D) in the Harlan County Battalion of Kentucky State Militia from October 1862 to January 1863. Served as postmaster of Harlan Court House and Spurlock in Harlan County, Kentucky from September 1861 to November 1865.
